text.div:
Other Sample Diagnosis

Contains the additional (not contained in ICD-10) codes needed for coding the MIABIS Sample Diagnosis plus a non-MIABIS code for indicating tumor material without a specific diagnosis.

This code system https://fhir.bbmri.de/CodeSystem/OtherSampleDiagnosis defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
healthy HealthySample contains healthy material
unknown Unknown
not-applicable Not applicable
unspecified-tumor Unspecified tumorSample contains tumor material, a specific diagnosis is not known

name: OtherSampleDiagnosis
title: Other Sample Diagnosis
description: Contains the additional (not contained in ICD-10) codes needed for coding the MIABIS Sample Diagnosis plus a non-MIABIS code for indicating tumor material without a specific diagnosis.

concept.definition: Sample contains tumor material, a specific diagnosis is not known
